attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BBQs smell and stink us out of house and home whenever the weather is warm.
People have perfectly good kitchens, there is no need whatsoever to cook these stinky meals out of doors.
They smell and stick out our homes to such an extent that we have to close all doors and windows in nice weather to keep the stench out!
This is unacceptable!
There should be legislation to ban them forthwith!
